endpoints.description: Endpoint that serves Prometheus metrics.
GET operation for /health/live in query_service.
GET operation for /health/ready in query_service.
Returns portfolios with optional filtering by portfolio ID, CIF, and booking center. Used by UI/lotus-gateway for portfolio discovery and navigation.

endpoints.summary: Get a Single Portfolio by ID
endpoints.description:
Retrieves a single portfolio by its unique ID.
Returns a `404 Not Found` if the portfolio does not exist.

endpoints.summary: Get Position History for a Security
endpoints.description: Returns epoch-aware position history for a portfolio-security key across a date range. Used for drill-down views and lineage-aware troubleshooting.

endpoints.summary: Get Latest Positions for a Portfolio
endpoints.description: Returns latest current-epoch positions for a portfolio. Used by holdings screens and downstream review/analytics flows.

endpoints.summary: Get BUY Lot State for a Position
endpoints.description: Returns durable BUY lot records for a portfolio-security key, including linkage and policy metadata used for lifecycle traceability.
Returns accrued-income offset state initialized by BUY events for a portfolio-security key.
Returns security-side BUY linkage fields and linked cashflow details for reconciliation.
Returns transactions for a portfolio with filters, pagination, and sorting. Designed for transaction ledgers, audit timelines, and investigative support.
Returns reference instrument records with optional filtering by security and product type. Used by lookup selectors and enrichment workflows.

endpoints.summary: Get Market Prices for a Security
endpoints.description: Returns market price series for a security with optional date-range filtering. Used by valuation checks and market data diagnostics.

endpoints.summary: Get FX Rates for a Currency Pair
endpoints.description: Returns FX rates for a currency pair over an optional date range. Used by valuation/performance conversion diagnostics and reconciliation.

endpoints.summary: Get operational support overview for a portfolio
endpoints.description: Returns support-oriented operational state for a portfolio, including reprocessing/valuation queue indicators and latest data availability markers.

endpoints.summary: List valuation jobs for support workflows
endpoints.description: Returns valuation jobs for a portfolio with pagination and optional status filtering. Designed for operations/support dashboards.

endpoints.summary: List aggregation jobs for support workflows
endpoints.description: Returns aggregation jobs for a portfolio with pagination and optional status filtering. Designed for operations/support dashboards.

endpoints.summary: Get lineage state for a portfolio-security key
endpoints.description: Returns lineage-relevant state (epoch, watermark, latest artifacts) for a specific portfolio-security key.

endpoints.summary: List lineage keys for a portfolio
endpoints.description: Returns current lineage keys (portfolio-security state rows) for a portfolio with pagination and optional status/security filtering.
Returns effective policy diagnostics and provenance for the given consumer and tenant context, including strict-mode behavior and allowed sections.
Returns baseline or simulation snapshot sections for an integration consumer. Supports positions baseline/projected/delta, portfolio totals, and instrument enrichment.

endpoints.summary: Resolve issuer enrichment for security identifiers
endpoints.description: Returns issuer enrichment for a caller-provided security_id list. Records are deterministic and preserve request order. Unknown securities are returned with null issuer fields.
Returns backend-governed lotus-core capability and workflow flags for a consumer system and tenant context. Intended for lotus-gateway/UI and lotus-manage feature control.
Returns portfolio selector options for lotus-gateway/UI portfolio selection workflows.
Returns instrument selector options for lotus-gateway/UI trade and intake workflows.
Returns distinct currency selector options derived from portfolio base currencies and instrument currencies.
Create a simulation session for a portfolio.
Get simulation session metadata by session identifier.
Close an active simulation session.
Add or update simulation changes for a session.
Delete a simulation change from a session.
Return projected positions after applying session changes.
Return projected summary metrics for a simulation session.
Endpoint that serves Prometheus metrics.
GET operation for /health/live in ingestion_service.
GET operation for /health/ready in ingestion_service.
Ingests a list of portfolios and publishes each to a Kafka topic.
Ingests a single financial transaction and publishes it to a Kafka topic.
Ingests a list of financial transactions and publishes each to a Kafka topic.
Ingests a list of financial instruments and publishes each to a Kafka topic.
Ingests a list of market prices and publishes each to a Kafka topic.
Ingests a list of FX rates and publishes each to a Kafka topic.
Ingests a list of business dates and publishes each to a Kafka topic.

Accepts a list of transaction IDs and publishes a reprocessing request
event for each to a Kafka topic.
Accepts a mixed payload (portfolio, instruments, transactions, market prices, FX rates, business dates) for UI/manual/file-based onboarding and publishes to existing lotus-core topics.

endpoints.summary: Preview and validate bulk upload data
endpoints.description: Validates CSV/XLSX rows against lotus-core ingestion contracts without publishing events. Returns row-level errors and normalized sample rows for UI correction workflows.
Validates CSV/XLSX rows and publishes valid records to existing lotus-core ingestion topics. By default rejects partial uploads; set allowPartial=true to publish valid rows only.
